short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Order ingredients for making a dish and suggest alternatives using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From Recipe to Reality: AI-Powered Ingredient Shopping Made Easy

This Chrome extension extracts recipes from YouTube video descriptions and generates a shopping list with the help of AI. It suggests alternative ingredients when needed and, once finalized by the user, automatically creates a cart with all the ingredients on a quick commerce platform like Blinkit.
